en_us: Find out that a liquid tank is not an epic submarine
Bottle your own experience from a liquid tank
Store liquids like Water, Lava, Milk, or Soup compactly in special tanks and interact with them!
Liquid Tanks can store various liquids in bulk.\n\nThe first slot of the liquid tank acts as both the input and output of the liquid tank.
Liquid Tanks can be crafted in a Custom Crafter:
Store liquids like Water, Lava, Milk, or Soup compactly in special tanks and interact with them!

Standard liquids can be stored by liquid tanks.

Water Tank
- Drains water buckets, water bottles
- Fills buckets, bottles
- Fills adjacent cauldrons

Lava Tank
- Drains lava buckets
- Fills buckets
- Fuels adjacent furnaces
- Drains lava cauldrons
- Fills adjacent cauldrons

Rabbit Stew Tank
- Drains rabbit stew
- Fills bowls
- Feeds drinkers

Beetroot Soup Tank
- Drains beetroot soup, beetroot
- Fills bowls
- Feeds drinkers

Mushroom Stew Tank
- Drains mushroom stew
- Fills bowls
- Milks mooshrooms
- Feeds drinkers

Milk Tank
- Drains milk buckets
- Fills buckets
- Milks cows
- Clear mob effects

Honey Tanks
- Drains honey bottles, honey blocks
- Fills bottles
- Casts honey blocks into cauldrons
- Clears mob poison
- Feeds drinkers

Experience Tanks
- Drains bottles o' enchanting, enchanted books
- Fills bottles
- Absorbs experience orbs, experience points
- Fills experience points
